name: Moonlight Stalker

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Bluff 3 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.

sections.body: While you have concealment from an opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls against that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You are adept at using shadows to conceal your attacks.
